item.title: Scaffolding, Part 1 of: What Makes for Good K12 Computer Science Curriculum?
item.description: I’ve written a lot of CS curriculum. Hundreds of hours worth, for my own company, for my classroom, and for other companies that valued my expertise. As a high school teacher, I’ve also used countless other curricula made by other people, some of which was very effective, and a lot that was fair to terrible. Because I’ve had so much experience both writing and using CS curriculum, I know firsthand what to look for in a computer science curriculum product, and what can make a curriculum effective in a K-12 classroom.
